title: Camp Bloodbath
description: Welcome to Camp Blue Finch, where romance in the sun can turn deadly! Where the days are warm, the girls are cool, the nights are always hotâ€¦ and evil lurks around every corner.
quote: Did I miss the Kumbaya circle?
altHero: a summer camp cabin in the rain
alt1: Amanda Cartwright as Nancy, a blonde camp counselor
alt2: a young woman screams as she sees something in a freezer
alt3: a man wearing a mask and gloves grabs the face of a terried male counselor
alt4: a young woman looks fed up as she rests a machete across her shoulders
